CustomField.formula:
IF( OR( AND(FS_Current_Spicy_Cherry__c = "Pibb/Pibb Zero", TEXT(FS_GS1_New_Spicy_Cherry__c)= "Dr Pepper/Diet Dr Pepper") ,
AND( FS_Current_Spicy_Cherry__c = "Dr Pepper/Diet Dr Pepper" , TEXT(FS_GS1_New_Spicy_Cherry__c)= "Pibb/Pibb Zero"),
AND(FS_Current_Spicy_Cherry__c = "Pibb/Pibb Zero", TEXT(FS_GS2_New_Spicy_Cherry__c)= "Dr Pepper/Diet Dr Pepper"),
AND( FS_Current_Spicy_Cherry__c = "Dr Pepper/Diet Dr Pepper" , TEXT(FS_GS2_New_Spicy_Cherry__c)= "Pibb/Pibb Zero") ),TRUE,FALSE)
CustomField.label: Spicy Cherry Flavor Change
